title: We’ve Got Five Years, What A Surprise
summary:
Key ideas:
- It's the fifth anniversary of Slate Star Codex and the author is happy with its progress.
- The author expresses gratitude towards people who helped with behind-the-scenes work, subreddit moderation, podcast, meetups, open thread system, and guest-blogging.
- The author expresses gratitude towards advertisers, Patreon supporters, people who engage with him, and people who comment on his posts.
- The author also expresses gratitude towards people who sent him emails, requests, and questions.

Key learnings:
- Having a supportive community is essential for the success of a blog.
- It's important to express gratitude and recognize the contributions of others.

Key questions:
- No key questions are proposed in this post.
